title: 20th ban
body: Happy 20th ban hahaha! This game just seems to really hate me but idgaf. I'll just keep making more and so on and so on. This day just seemed to really just staright up hate me today, so much went bad and to end it off, I get perma banned hahaha fun. But that won't stop me, I'll keep going, making new accounts, ain't you people or the support team will ever change they're ways so fuck it. Why the hell should I? You start shit with me I'll come back harder. And if you want to report after because thats the type of pussies you are then fine. Sugarpenguin lets go. See y'all idiots next time I get permabanned

replies.body: {{champion:267}} Well as fun as that was, as there is no productive conversation to be had here, Im going to lock this guy up.
I always find it funny when an OP has "idgaf" in their post. If they truly didn't give a fuck then the thread wouldn't exist.

> [{quoted}](name=AeroWaffle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=m6rjcAN7,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-07-25T04:14:02.746+0000)
>
> I always find it funny when an OP has "idgaf" in their post. If they truly didn't give a fuck then the thread wouldn't exist.

But without this thread how would we ever know how cool, rebellious and edgy OP is?

>Happy 20th ban hahaha! This game just seems to really hate me

Not following the rules means that the game  hates you ? {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Ahahahaha yeah assume thats what I meant. Typical of you peeps. Just another reason why I hate you guys.

>Ahahahaha yeah assume thats what I meant 

I mean you didnt tell the reason u are banned in the post  making me  assume  what happend .

>And if you want to report after because thats the type of pussies you are then fine.

^ this text alone makes me belive  that you are flaming your team. does i assumed that.
Yes you do assume that

im curious whats the point of trying to get banned as much as possible and be toxic/verbally abusive/troll? 

does doing these things make you achieve greater heights in this game? does it make you the # 1 player in NA ? a pro? or just someone who needs to be a way online towards others ?
oh so youre becoming the same as the thing you bitch about ?
I... I dont see how any of that correlates....
Lol op got his boards account banned and has to post from an alt XD
Wow look who's smart enough to notice such a thing! Kudos to you!

> [{quoted}](name=Skygardener,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=m6rjcAN7,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2019-07-25T04:33:47.235+0000)
>
> Wow look who's smart enough to notice such a thing! Kudos to you!

Wow i got recognized by the great.....person who got banned 20 times and who we all will forget about because they donâ€™t matter in the world XD
What wonderful narcissisticic arrogance. Good luck in life, you cant make new accounts there.
Now, is it us you hate or yourself?
Nope, just you all. No one else.  Also how obvious, runs to report button like always. Hahaah
I didn't report you though?
Nah, she is still alive. Dad was the one who died. Geez, at least get the dead people right if you want to throw insults.
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/rant
Oh thanks cause I so totally asked where I want to post this.
Don't get mad when people taunt you over bad plays.You're toxic because you're bad?Lol people like you are the reason why the community is toxic.
What a tit.
Is that your way of saying OP should Hakuna their Tatas?
Hey, whatever you find fun man. Little odd, but who are we to judge?
I find this game fun, but it's you people that seem to ruin it with your egos but hey who am I to judge. That's just how you people are and will forever be.
